document.full_text: vitali klitschko retained his wbc heavyweight title with a late first-round knockout of odlanier solis, who injured his knee in the fall and insisted it was that ' and not the champion's punch ' that ended the fight saturday.
document.title: vitali klitschko kos solis in 1st round
lines_and_colors: vitali klitschko retained his wbc heavyweight title with a late first-round knockout of odlanier solis, who injured his knee in the fall and insisted it was that ' and not the champion's punch ' that ended the fight saturday.
